casebody.data:
Lionel LEWIS, Employee
v.
CRAVEN REGIONAL MEDICAL CENTER, Employer and
VIRGINIA INSURANCE RECIPROCAL, Carrier. No. 693P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 2, 2006. Jill Quattlebaum Byrum, New Bern, for Medical Center, et al. Hugh D. Cox, Greenville, George W. Lennon, Raleigh, for Lionel Lewis.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 19th day of December 2005 by Defendants in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 2nd day of March 2006."

Justice MARTIN recused.
